所有软件包的分层结构

软件包分层结构：
datadic.dao, email.action, email.dao, email.service.imple, email.service.inf, email.tools, pojo, post.action, post.dao, post.inf, post.pojo, post.test, post.util, tips.action, tips.dao, tools, user.action, user.dao, user.imple, user.interceptor, user.service, user.service.imple

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport (implements com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, java.io.Serializable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware)
      • post.action.AutoShenheAction
      • user.action.BaseAction (implements org.apache.struts2.util.ServletContextAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletResponseAware)
        • user.action.LoginAction (implements com.opensymphony.xwork2.ModelDriven<T>)
        • user.action.MenuAction (implements com.opensymphony.xwork2.ModelDriven<T>)
